tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1880–89.
1880–89. Medium: silk
Technique: Jacquard woven 7&1 satin (yellow-green) with discontinuous supplementary wefts (multicolor) floating from face to face. Loomed width: 23 inches. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-1136.
